name: Anatomy Lesson #32
description:
This artwork was created for the Prosthetic Reality Volume 2 AR book by EyeJack
Artist: France Cadet www.francecadet.com 
Medium: AR Animation, MP4: 1024x1024 pixels 
---
Anatomy Lesson #32: Encourage him to meditate.
A poetic dissection of artificial desire.

Inspired by the Lessons of seduction from a famous advertising campaign for a French lingerie brand, France Cadet imagines a lesson of anatomy of this robotic version.

Mirroring the pose of the original lesson, a 3D avatar of the artist is kneeling on the ground, hands tied. Such as a Japanese human faced android, this cyborg seems able to feel emotion and desire. 

This artificial creature appears on the screen by successive slices, revealing its mechanical anatomy, while gradually rebuilding its outer shell. Once materialized, this evanescent pinup of modern times is spinning around before disappearing again by regular cuts.
